title: Blueprint, "Frederick B. Patterson Apartment: Master Bedroom", 1931
inscribed: Inscribed in blueprint, lower right: MASTER CHAMBER/SCALE 1/2"-1'0"/CONTRACTOR SHALL VERIFY ALL DIMENSIONS AND CONDITIONS/AT THE BUILDING/DRAWING NO. 330317/JOB-F.W.P./FOR DETAILS OF MASTER CHAMBER/SEE DWG. NO. 330315; at left: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY; in orange color pencil, lower right: OFFICE COPY; in blueprint, lower left: DECORATOR WILL FURNISH AND ERECT:/CLOSET DOORS, CLOS DOOR HARDWARE/FACING OF FIREPLACE & HEARTH/RADIATOR GRILLES/KNOBS & ESCUTHEONS; at right: JC STEWART WILL FURNISH AND ERECT:/ALL PARTITIONING, ROUGH & FINISH/PLASTER/CURTAIN POCKETS/FINISHED FLOOR/ONE FLUSH TYPE DOOR/RELIANCE FLUSH JAMBS/HARDWARE INCLUDING OLIVE/KNUCKLE HINGES EXCLUDING/KNOBS & ESCUTCHEONS; inscribed in graphite on verso: Master Chambr; dimensions, materials, instructions inscribed
description: Plan and elevations for Master Chamber.
